title: Hope Entangles
description: Hope Jones did a very, very stupid thing. She betrayed the man she was falling in love with just to keep her job, and is crippled with guilt.But now she has a problematic new neighbor who’s more than just a pain in the ass, a new addiction to breakfast breads, and she has to try and teach a teenager how to drive.Will she be able to do all this, get past the darkness in her past that comes calling, and still save her job… again?
author: Alice Bello
